title: 40 for 40: The 2016 Independence Bowl Preview
description:
Number 16 of 40 bowl previews, in which we may not discuss the Independence Bowl or the teams playing in it whatsoever! We will, however, use this episode to remind you that the Canadian Football League once put a team in Shreveport, which might help you understand why the CFL will never overtake the NFL.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
